'''"Maison Cardinalice's Clerk"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Court of Justice's Diligence is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Falling Star]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
